laboratory_examinations.findings: Treated with psychotherapy and tricyclic antidepressants for nightmares, insomnia, and depressed affect; mild improvement noted.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Largely unsuccessful treatments despite some mild improvements.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Nightmares ceased immediately after starting trazodone; sleep improved and mood improved slowly over months.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Medication was discontinued after one year.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Health deteriorated over time with several conditions including myocardial infarction and leg ulcers.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Health continued to deteriorate with increasing severity of multiple medical problems post-retirement.
